name: Computerona
description:
In this game you are a computer virus, and you must hack the world's safest computer by completing different hacking minigames.

You can download the game as a zip file or as setup. 

the second zip folder is with requirement file

This game was made by beginners, so if you had fun please leave a feedback.

Programming: Yair Mizrachi https://yair-mizrachi.itch.io/

Art: Capitainlll 

Music: zapsplat.com
